Cause technology is increasing exponentially exponentially (not a typo); morality police are forgetting that society changes as a result of technological change so it gets harder to prevent technological change as time goes on.

Trying to stop technological change is like trying to stop a tsunami by trying to physically tackle it with your body.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55834bb96368726c1200175a#post_55834bb96368726c1200175a
[bq="uc9"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5583491d6368726450001401#post_5583491d6368726450001401
No offense to anyone, but personally I think hipsters are the worst "geek" crowd in existence.  I'm not talking about the "wow!  Non-mainstream stuff has a lot of cool stuff!  I really want to try more stuff out!" crowd, but rather the metaphorical cancer type that tries to take over other geek cultures and bastardize them.[/bq]
I don't think there is anything inherently wrong with hipster culture itself. I've always been into non mainstream trending things myself. It drives innovation. But I get what you say with theore militant cancer variety that just wants to impose their views and tastes onto others. The pretentious snide bunch.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55834f676368726450001fd0#post_55834f676368726450001fd0
[bq="uc9"]It's purely hypothetical and just pure speculation, *BUT* here's my personal opinion on why anti-technology movements are gaining so much ground lately.

If we develop cheap androids, vr technology and such then people will have the ability for sexual stimulation other than missionary position for reproduction.  If people have the ability to have that level of sexual stimulation without needing another person then chances are that will push a lot of assholes of society out of the reproductive pool cause people will have the ability for sexual stimulation without people and thus will only choose to date when they want to date.

To put it better:
In say ten years I think the percentage of usa citizens that are single will be incredibly high, but it's because they will be waiting to choose someone they like instead of marrying out of wedlock and as a result while the percentage of people in relationships will be down the marriages will last ten times longer than the current average cause people will only marry people they like.

Tl:dr; purely guessing, but I think the reason why people don't want new technologies is because the norm will be people marrying only people they legitimately love instead out of wedlock.  Like the anti-condom argument; they don't want condoms cause they want people to be forced to marry out of wedlock.[/bq]
Will people still be allowed to marry people the old fashion way? Because I want to be able to.choose.

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558356256368723b430020a7#post_558356256368723b430020a7
hipsters use noncompliance to norms as an attempt at distancing themselves from normal society while at the same time not being too "out there"

the concept of being a hipster is how you present yourself; and that leads to a mindset that tends to be ostentatious rather than genuine

the driving force of innovation is to keep things fresh and new, and hipster ideology hasn't changed since forever. it's always full of idiots with feigned interests, usually in the case that they couldn't fit in to society in any other way and are doing shit the silly way

my views are gained from my experience ofc, idk if canadian hipsters are different

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558359186368725df0000a42#post_558359186368725df0000a42
Theoretically speaking if people start reproducing with only people they want and marriage out of wedlock becomes non-existent then that pushes the assholes of society out of the reproductive pool.

To use a modern example, potentially drama here, but TERFs don't want transgenders or crossdressers to exist cause they view it as a threat to their reproductive "rights".

To simplify it as much as humanly possible: assholes don't want competition for reproduction.  They view sex as their fundamental "right" and anything and everything that might potentially threaten their "right" to reproduce is "evil".

Tl:dr;
Nutjobs of the world, "I have a right to have sex!  If something threatens my right to have sex then they're evil!"
